Body.description: If this component is an HTML page component, this field is the body of the HTML.

Height.description: Required for Visualforce Area components. Indicates the height (in pixels) of the component.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

Name.description: The name of the home page component.

NamespacePrefix.description: A unique string to distinguish this type from any others.

ShowLabel.description: ID of the home page layout.

ShowScrollbars.description: ID of the home page layout.
